
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_library(server-lib-exec_node)
target_compile_options(server-lib-exec_node PRIVATE
  -Wdeprecated-this-capture
)
include(FindProtobuf)
find_package(Protobuf REQUIRED)
include_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
include_directories(${Protobuf_INCLUDE_DIRS})
message(boroda "${Protobuf_INCLUDE_DIRS}")
target_link_libraries(server-lib-exec_node PUBLIC
${Protobuf_LIBRARIES}
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  #contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  yt-yt-ytlib
  server-lib-job_agent
  server-lib-job_proxy
  yt-library-containers
  server-lib-misc
)
target_proto_messages(server-lib-exec_node PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/exec_node/proto/supervisor_service.proto
)
target_sources(server-lib-exec_node PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/exec_node/public.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/exec_node/config.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/exec_node/helpers.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/exec_node/job_report.cpp
)
target_proto_addincls(server-lib-exec_node
  ./
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ytsaurus
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/protobuf/src
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ytsaurus
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/protobuf/src
)
target_proto_outs(server-lib-exec_node
  --cpp_out=${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ytsaurus/
)
